title: Non Non Biyori Repeat: Hotaru ga Tanoshinda

alternative_titles.en: Non Non Biyori Repeat: Hotaru Had Fun
alternative_titles.ja: のんのんびより りぴーと 蛍が楽しんだ

synopsis:
Life in rural Asahigaoka moves at its own pace. Devoid of the pleasures and worries of a bustling metropolis, this small village might seem painfully dull at first glance. However, despite living this far from her hometown of Tokyo, Hotaru Ichijou manages to find a group of friends whom she can spend quality time with. No matter whether it is winter, spring, summer, or fall, they make full use of everything the nature around them has to offer.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
